title: Trying No-Heat Curl Hacks From TikTok (T-Shirt Method, Sock Method, Spiral Rollers)

media:group.media:title: Trying No-Heat Curl Hacks From TikTok (T-Shirt Method, Sock Method, Spiral Rollers)
media:group.media:description:
BuzzFeed Producer Janna (@janna.em) tries t-shirt curls and a few other heatless hairstyle hacks to get the perfect bouncy curls. Special thank you to Sahana! instagram.com/my_pawfect_family tiktok.com/@mypawfectfamily

Spiral Hair Rollers
